description: Advanced text-to-video generation with reference image support and high-quality output

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A graceful dancer performing ballet in a grand theater...

reference_image_url.description: Optional reference image URL to guide the video generation style and composition

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

style.description: Visual style for the generated video

prompt_details.style_guide: Create elegant, sophisticated descriptions with attention to artistic and cinematic elements
best_practices: Use refined, artistic language for scene descriptions
Include specific details about lighting and composition
Describe graceful movements and elegant actions
Reference artistic styles or cinematic techniques
Focus on aesthetic beauty and visual harmony

example_prompts.title: Ballet Performance
example_prompts.prompt: A graceful dancer performing ballet in a grand theater, flowing movements captured in elegant slow motion, stage lights creating dramatic shadows, red velvet curtains and ornate architecture in the background

example_prompts.title: Artistic Portrait
example_prompts.prompt: An artist painting at an easel in a sun-drenched studio, brush strokes flowing across canvas, natural light streaming through tall windows, colors blending in artistic harmony

request.prompt: A musician playing violin in a cozy cafe, warm lighting and intimate atmosphere

example_requests.title: Reference-Guided Generation
example_requests.description: Video generation with reference image guidance

request.prompt: A fashion model walking down a runway, elegant movements and professional lighting
A craftsperson working with traditional tools in their workshop, authentic movements and natural lighting

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Use reference images to guide style and composition
Vidu excels at elegant, artistic content
Longer durations allow for more sophisticated scenes
Style parameter significantly affects the visual approach
Best results with refined, artistic prompts
limitations: Optimized for artistic and cinematic content
Reference images must be high quality for best results
Complex action scenes may be less accurate
Processing time increases with longer durations

pricing.estimated_cost: Premium pricing for artistic quality output
